title: Node.JS is backed by Google
content: Being sponsored by the Google V8 engine is itself the biggest selling point for Node.js to full-stack development services. The Node.js debugging feature is present in Chrome 57+ by default, which can be used to eliminate both front-end and back-end errors. While JavaScript operates in the front end through Node.js, it is supported by Google V8 chrome in the back end.

title: MVC Origins
content: The Model-View-Controller (MVC) design pattern was first introduced in the 1970s by Trygve Reenskaug, a Norwegian computer scientist, while he was working on Smalltalk-80 at Xerox Parc.
